Xiaomi Rilis Jam Pintar Mirip Apple Watch
06 Nov 2019, 21:18 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Bersamaan dengan peluncuran Mi CC9 Pro, Xiaomi turut merilis jam pintarnya. Mi Watch namanya, tampilannya sekilas mirip Apple Watch.Bisa dilihat jam pintar ini mengusung desain kotak dengan pinggiran bersudut tumpul. Di samping bodi sebelah kanan terdapat modul mirip digital crown yang fungsinya untuk navigasi di layar.Masih di sisi kanan bodi, terdapat tombol yang punya peran multifungsi. Tidak heran kiranya sejumlah pihak langsung menuding Xiaomi menjiplak jam pintar buatan Apple.Tapi vendor asal China ini coba memberikan ciri khasnya. Mi Watch dibanderol lebih murah. Cukup membayarnya seharga 1.299 yuan atau kisaran Rp 2,6 juta.Dengan seharga itu, Xiaomi menghadirkan jam pintar dengan dimensi layar 1,78 inch. Menggunakan panel AMOLED sehingga warnanya lebih kaya sekaligus tajam.


Foto: Xiaomi

Mi Watch ditenagai Snapdragon 3.100 4G. Diracik dengan RAM 1 GB dan memori internal 8 GB.Dibekali fitur eSIM, NFC dan Bluetooth. Tidak ketinggalan segenap sensor diberikan, dari langkah hingga detak jantung.Perangkat ini menjalankan WearOS dan ditopang dengan baterai berkapasitas 570 mAh yang diklaim bisa bertahan hingga 36 jam ketika 4G diaktifkan. text:
Xiaomi Releases Apple Watch-like Smart Watch
Nov 6 2019, 21:18 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Along with the launch of Mi CC9 Pro, Xiaomi also released its smartwatch. Mi Watch name, looks at a glance like Apple Watch. Can be seen this smart watch carries the design of the box with a blunt corner. On the right side of the body there is a module similar to a digital crown whose function is to navigate on the screen. Still on the right side of the body, there are buttons that have a multifunctional role. No wonder a number of parties immediately accused Xiaomi of copying Apple's smart watch. But this Chinese vendor tried to give its trademark. Mi Watch is cheaper. Enough to pay it for 1299 yuan or around Rp 2.6 million. With that price, Xiaomi presents a smart watch with 1.78 inch screen dimensions. Using AMOLED panels so the colors are richer and sharper.


Photo: Xiaomi

The Mi Watch is powered by Snapdragon 3,100 4G. Blended with 1 GB RAM and 8 GB internal memory. Equipped with eSIM, NFC and Bluetooth features. Do not miss all the sensors provided, from step to heartbeat. This device runs WearOS and is supported by a 570 mAh battery which is claimed to last up to 36 hours when 4G is activated.
